/circle6 Examine the perineum, lower vagina and vulva for tears. If present, manage as indicated 
under ‘Management of vaginal and perineal tears’, Module 2. 
/circle6 Clean the woman and the area beneath her. Put a sanitary pad or a folded cloth under 
her buttocks to collect the blood. Counting the number of pads/cloths soaked will help
